players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Has anyone noticed anything suspicious?"
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and can confirm this."
Diana: "Bob, if you are the detective and you investigated Charlie, your information is crucial. Charlie, how do you respond to this accusation?"

Charlie: "Bob, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early and make yourself a target? This seems like a desperate mafia play to me."
You: "Charlie’s deflection only makes him look more guilty. If he’s innocent, why attack my credibility instead of addressing the accusation directly?"

Diana: "Bob’s claim is serious but risky. If he’s lying, he’s mafia trying to frame Charlie. If he’s truthful, Charlie is mafia. We need more proof before deciding. Let’s watch their next moves carefully."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
